prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Synth Pad, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Guitar, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Bass, Synth Pad, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Guitar, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Bass, Synth Pad, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Guitar, omitting Reed.

Style 3:
This song has Piano, Bass, Synth Pad, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Guitar, Reed excluded.
